data.message: How do you remove people from groups and/or remove groups ??

replies.message: Hey Carrie. From your group, go to your list of members, find the member you want to remove, then you have the option to remove or block them. Removed members will have to request to join the group again if they wish to rejoin. Blocked members won't be able to find the group in search or see any of its content, and they can't be added to the group again by members. You can also learn more about deleting a group here: http://bit.ly/29nv7zi. -Jordan
I cannot pull up the group or members by tapping or holding on the particular group..?
Hi Carrie. Are you using Facebook on your computer, an Android device, or iOS device when trying to view group members? -Kevin
Where I tap " no more notifications for this article ".....they always come back.  Same after 'hiding' them.....why have it if it doesn't work?
Any ideas on the group deleting with Android?
